page.title: 03FASHION IN LOWESTOFT
page.content: In our LIFESTYLE survey, we found the most popular shoes for women at the moment are court shoes(Wessex style). The most popular colours for womens shoes are pastel colours (pink, blue, white and yellow). Popular mens shoes are slip-ons in grey and black. The most popular clothes for women are separates in colours like pastels, in cotton. For men, the most popular type of clothing is jeans. Most popular colour is white (we could see this because of all the white clothes in the windows of lots of shops!). We also surveyed a material shop in which the best-selling materials at the moment are sweat-shirt, tracksuit and also creased cotton in white and pink.
